QuestData.Title: Inciting the Elements
QuestData.Description: This is no mere natural occurrence, $n. There must be a twilight presence behind our lines that we haven't accounted for.$B$BIt's possible that whoever is instigating the elemental disturbance is using foul magic to hide themselves from our sight.$B$BSeek the aid of the faerie dragons that roam near the World Tree; they can see through any of our enemy's illusions.$B$BFeed them the juniper berries that grow nearby to gain their trust.
QuestData.LogDescription: Feed Juniper Berries to the Faerie Dragons and slay 4 Twilight Inciters.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $n. We cannot allow the Twilight's Hammer spies this close to the world tree!
